title: Design notes: switch profiles
body:
## Expected fixes

- [ ] Add drop shadow on profile cards (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147656#429588832))
- [ ] Check avatar font size (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147656#429589079))
- [ ] Check background when scrolling profiles list(full comment [here][(https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147656#429596823))
- [ ] Add animation on transition between profiles (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147656#430251047) and video [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YdO-oM5tB2rvw3sACQMrC2x8x2FqjNQk/view))

- [ ] Button should be blur (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147656#429604968))

### Add new profile
- [ ] Update icons (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1946:147656#429603184))
